definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Product Description: Owing to your request, materials of eye shadow are filled for your needing.
sentences.chinese: 此款眼影粉可以依據您的需求，填充您所需要的原料。

sentences.english: "They don't sit in fine lines like powders do, " she says.
sentences.chinese: “眼影粉會產生細紋，而眼影膏就不會，”她說。

sentences.english: "They don't sit in fine lines like powders do, " she says.
sentences.chinese: “眼影粉會產生細紋，而眼影膏就不會，”她說。

sentences.english: Most likely you look great with some bronzer and a couple strokes of mascara.
sentences.chinese: 打上黃色眼影，塗上睫毛膏，你很可能看起來很漂亮。

sentences.english: Green and blue eye shadows were made naturally, with the mineral malachite.
sentences.chinese: 綠色和藍色眼影是由孔雀石這種礦石天然製成的。

sentences.english: Forget the heavy coats of eye shadow and foundation.
sentences.chinese: 忘了濃重的眼影和眼底粉吧。

sentences.english: Delicate silky powder is easy for you to make up, give you more average and vivid color.
sentences.chinese: 細膩柔滑的眼影粉質易於上色，令色彩更均勻生動。

sentences.english: This may necessitate touching up your eye shadow a bit.
sentences.chinese: 不過，必不可免地也會擦掉一點眼影。

sentences.english: Sinks right in and makeup does not cake up on eyelids.
sentences.chinese: 不油膩，吸收快，而且眼影也不會在上眼皮那兒結塊。

sentences.english: So for that you should go for eye shadows that are lighter in colour, or are of neutral shades.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你應該選擇那些顏色較淡或者中性色調的眼影。

sentences.english: I'd like to have a facial massage first. Trim my eyebrows and tint the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 我想先來個面部按摩，然後修一下眉毛，畫點眼影。

sentences.english: Try some silver as a little eyeshadow on the ends of your eye.
sentences.chinese: 作爲你的眼睛兩端的小眼影嘗試一些銀。

sentences.english: Do not wear frosty eye shadow, and avoid anything with a blue undertone.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用霜狀眼影，以及避免使用藍色底色的化妝品。

sentences.english: Her face glistens with sweat, but her purple eye shadow is intact.
sentences.chinese: 她滿臉汗珠，但是她的紫色眼影仍然完好無損。

sentences.english: Garnish with brunet eye shadow aggravating eye end, on the vision to pull the effect of eye end.
sentences.chinese: 再用深色眼影加重眼尾，視覺上拉提眼尾的效果。

sentences.english: Women, in colorful skirts and tops, are as beautiful as flowers in summer.
sentences.chinese: 流光眼影，加上溢彩吊帶裙，身亦如夏花般絢爛迷人。

definition: bitten-lips look (darker lipstick applied on the inner part of the lips, and lighter on the outer part)
